---
title: "Wrapped AA"
description: AA tokens wrapped in ERC20 tokens
---

Several DeFi projects need a wrapped AA to operate, this is the official Wrapped AA token info (Arthera Mainnet):

- Token contract address: **[0x52b99e619A7CfC68753D1B112BB4111732cB83b6](https://explorer.arthera.net/address/0x52b99e619A7CfC68753D1B112BB4111732cB83b6?tab=contract)**
- Token symbol: **WAA**
- Token decimal: **18**

You can view the Wrapped AA token [contract source code and ABI on the explorer](https://explorer.arthera.net/address/0x52b99e619A7CfC68753D1B112BB4111732cB83b6?tab=contract).

:::info

_Latest update: [January 5, 2024](https://github.com/artheranet/arthera-docs)_

:::
